name: Rashmi Dutta Baruah
content: Rashmi Dutta BaruahSkip to main contentSkip to navigationRashmi Dutta BaruahAssociate ProfessorDepartment of Computer Science & EngineeringIndian Institute of Technology GuwahatiDr. Rashmi Dutta Baruah Joined the Department of Computer Science & Engineering, IIT Guwahati in June 2014. She completed her Ph.D. from Lancaster University, United Kingdom in 2013. During her Ph.D. she was among the 10 international students who received Faculty of Science and Technology full studentship. From Nov. 2021 to Nov. 2023, she was a Marie Curie Research Fellow (Connex-Plus) at Universidad Carlos III de Madrid and for a short period at Robert Bosch Madrid, and Vienna University of Technology. Her research interest lies in working in interdisciplinary areas where AI has potential applications.  Research AreasArtificial Intelligence,  Industrial Applications of AI, Explainable AI and Model Interpretability, Deep Learning. Please visit Applied Artificial Intelligence Lab page and Claire Project for more details.
